name: Teo Fabi
introduction: Teodorico "Teo" Fabi (TAY-oh FAH-bee; born 9 March 1955, Milan, MI, Lombardy, Italy) is an Italian former racing driver who drove in Formula One in the mid-1980s.  Despite scoring three pole positions, he never lead a lap in F1.  He is the older brother of Corrado Fabi.
